segments.text: This whole scene is just one big accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed anything yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is literally pouring over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is standing in a growing pool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And behind her, two children are committing a cookie heist!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a stool that's practically falling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly unaware of their immediate environment?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's not just a small oversight, it's a monumental one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside only highlights the impending domestic chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a growing sense of frustration just watching it all unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Surely, at some point, she has to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire situation is truly baffling to me.
segments.speaker: PAR
